overview:
HackingTag Security is technology company which was a hacking company till 10th November 2011. It’s also know as the biggest IT company of kashmir. It is owned by Areeb Majeed. The website primary focus is in IT, HackingTag Security was launched by Areeb Majeed from his home. There is not much content on their site. But they are best know your their services. HackingTag Security owns three service. On twitter, they are being followed a popular social media communications dashboard know as HootSuite.

HackingTag Security’s News

The best know service of HackingTag Security. It a news blog which is focused on world news and technology news. This blog was founded in October 2011. With reported more than 30,000 page views in 3 days. The website’s Technorati rank is 10710 (Last update on 5th Jan 2012) . On 23rd December 2011 they upgraded their mobile theme. Access HackingTag Security’s News: http://utag.x10.mx/news/. On 23rd Feb, 2012 HackingTag Security closed it.

TechInUs

TechInUs is a full tech blog focused in Technology and Games News. Launched on 1st January 2012.
